## ‚ú® About This Repo

This repository contains √Åudea Infrastructure as Code (IaC) configurations using [Nix](https://nixos.org/) [Flakes](https://nixos.wiki/wiki/Flakes). It helps us manage, reproduce, and share the development environments and system setups with ease.


## ü¶Ñ Why Nix?

- No more "it works on my machine" problems.
- Effortless rollbacks and upgrades.
- Clean and isolated environments.

## üí° Get Started

```sh
# -- install nix (for non-NixOS systems)
sh <(curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -L https://nixos.org/nix/install) --no-daemon

# -- open a nixos development environment
nix develop github:cosasdepuma/nix/audea

# ... and much more!
```
